Hello World!

This is Test page

test

Read Jekyll Quick Start

Complete usage and documentation available at: Jekyll Bootstrap

Update Author Attributes

In _config.yml remember to specify your own data:

title : My Blog =)

author :
  name : Name Lastname
  email : blah@email.test
  github : username
  twitter : username

The theme should reference these variables whenever needed.

Sample Posts

This blog contains sample posts which help stage pages and blog data. When you don’t need the samples anymore just delete the _posts/core-samples folder.

$ rm -rf _posts/core-samples

Here’s a sample “posts list”.

  • 10 Jul 2013 » Q. 起動・停止・再起動等の操作実行がタイムアウトで失敗します。対処方法はありますか？
  • 10 Jul 2013 » Q. Operations(start/stop/reboot) timed out.Is there a solution?
  • 10 Jul 2013 » Q. I can't access GateOne. What is the cause?
  • 10 Jul 2013 » Q. GateOneに接続できません原因として何が考えられますか？
  • 10 Jul 2013 » Q. 稼働するESXiホスト毎に仮想マシンをホストグループ登録は可能ですか？
  • 10 Jul 2013 » Q. Is it possible to assign VM to ESXi host name Zabbix HostGroup?
  • 29 May 2013 » Q. HTTPプロキシ経由でAWS APIにアクセスすることは可能ですか？
  • 29 May 2013 » Q. Is it possible to access AWS API via an HTTP proxy?
  • 29 May 2013 » Q. Is it possible to reduce the high load of HyClops?
  • 29 May 2013 » Q. HyClopsの高負荷を低減することは可能ですか？
  • 29 May 2013 » Q. AmazonEC2インスタンスやvSphere仮想マシン以外のホストに対してGateOneでSSH接続は可能ですか？
  • 29 May 2013 » Q. Is it possible to use GateOne for hosts in addition to EC2 instance or vSphere VM?

To-Do

This theme is still unfinished. If you’d like to be added as a contributor, please fork! We need to clean up the themes, make theme usage guides with theme-specific markup examples.
